Educational developer at Eindhoven University of Technology ◆ Modernizing education through training, research, and assessment.

profile_positions.title: Teacher Professionalization Consultant & Trainer @ TEACH Program, Policy, Development, and Projects

profile_positions.description: In this role, I mentored ~30 first-year students through their transition to college.
profile_positions.title: Community Associate at Sid Rich College

profile_positions.description:
🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Delivered ~$170k in instructional services across the face-to-face and hybrid learning formats. Designed and facilitated learning experiences for 30 adult learners to improve written and oral communication, and environmental literacy. Received an evaluation rating of 1.5 out of 5 across 3 courses (1 being the highest rating).
profile_positions.title: Adjunct Lecturer, Program in Writing and Communication

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
Provided strategic vision, management, and program design for expanding L&D opportunities for junior education professionals aligned with professional standards. Designed, facilitated, and assessed L&D for staff and academic experts to improve learning outcomes, inclusion, and career growth.

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Co-created a blended course design program to train ~230 instructors to transition to digital teaching during the Covid-19 pandemic in less than 3 weeks while migrating face-to-face programming to a virtual format with minimal disruption.
▪️ Designed, managed, and evaluated a fellowship program for 18 advanced graduate students to aid career growth and expand the reach of the Center. Every year recruited fellows and coached a team of 3-4 students in preparation and delivery of training workshops for new instructors. Increased workshop impact by 280% in 2 years. 
▪️ Partnered with deans, directors, academic leaders, and external partners across 8 academic and technology units, and 10 peer institutions to create L&D opportunities that expanded the reach and impact of the center by ~35%.
▪️ Developed assessment plan for an onboarding program, analyzed data via Qualtrics, and suggested solutions for improving program effectiveness and efficiency, such as supplementary online resources and networking sessions. 
▪️ Wrote a successful proposal for institution-wide adoption of a name coaching software (NameCoach) that improved learning environment in over 1000 courses. 
▪️ Managed accredited professional certificate program for ~45 junior education professionals per term to coach in career preparation, performance improvement, and application of education standards through courses, practicums, and 1-on-1 sessions. Achieved 56% placement rate at education institutions across the world.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Director at the Center for Teaching Excellence

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
I joined this unit to launch a Learning Design Collaboratory, a strategic initiative designed to improve student learning outcomes in foundational courses and reduce the cost of courses to students and to the institution. At the same time, I took leadership of a teaching and learning innovation program focused on transformative implementation of instructional technologies.

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Designed and launched a cohort-based professional learning program that prepared ~30 academic SMEs for course redesign by providing design guidelines, learner engagement strategies, and an environment for peer feedback, and by aligning program priorities with Learning Design and Instructional Technologies units.
▪️ Collaborated cross-functionally to concentrate technological solutions, open educational resources, academic support services, and assessment tools resulting in tailored course design solutions that improved learner experience and lowers cost of delivery for ~20 courses.
▪️ Expanded existing training materials and workshops on the use of social learning tools, LMS, and assessment technologies by collaborating with instructional technology leaders.
▪️ Facilitated Active Learning Classrooms training that streamlined adoption of innovative learning solutions and digital tools among ~60 academic SMEs.
▪️ Consulted with 46 education professionals to problem-solve instructional challenges, enhance learner experience, and assist in institutional transformation.
profile_positions.title: Teaching & Learning Specialist, Office of Teaching, Learning, and Technology

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
I joined this unit to expand professional development programs for graduate students and postdocs and to build digital training resources.

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Co-facilitated a professional development course for 20+ junior education professionals on active learning, course design, and learning science.
▪️ Co-authored digital resources on syllabus development and learning assessment techniques.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow, Center for Teaching and Learning

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
I joined this unit to revitalize the center and establish it as a valuable campus resource through strategic planning, needs assessment, program development, and DEI methods and practices.

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Organized and facilitated a diversity panel through a cross-functional collaboration with DEI staff, mental health support services, and community leaders that raised awareness of DEI issues on campus, promoted DEI resources, and increased allyship practices for 60+ participants.
▪️ Trained ~20 academic SMEs in the adoption of learner-centered strategies and digital and social learning technologies in 2 cohort-based programs.
▪️ Analyzed learning needs assessment data from 5 courses and recommended learning solutions that helped instructors address challenges in learning environment and accessibility for adult learners.
profile_positions.title: Instructional Services Coordinator, Centers for Teaching and Technology

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
I was offered this inaugural Dean's Teaching Fellowship in recognition of my excellent teaching. I joined the Center for Faculty Development and Excellence to help expand L&D programs for faculty and to research L&D methods and practices in higher education. 

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️Developed a digital resource on classroom research to support a systematic creation of knowledge about teaching and learning.
▪️ Prepared and delivered 4 presentations to mid-career education professionals on how to document professional practice and conduct rigorous inquiry into their professional effectiveness. 
▪️ Synthesized research on effective mentorship practices for female education professionals that was subsequently used in the development of institution-wide mentorship resources.
profile_positions.title: Dean's Teaching Fellow, Center for Faculty Development and Excellence

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
I followed my passions to grad school: I wanted to develop expertise in Caribbean literary & cultural studies, to teach in the humanities, and to deepen my research skills. My dissertation research analyzed the human and cultural impact of environmental dispossession in the Caribbean.

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Completed 180-page dissertation using interpretive research methods; consulted 4 stakeholders of diverse management levels.
▪️ Delivered ~$450k in instructional services. Designed and facilitated learning experiences for 60-70 adult learners and provided written feedback to improve written communication. Received an evaluation rating of 8 out of 10 across 4 courses.
▪️ Communicated insights to different audiences in 9 presentations at academic conferences.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Associate & Instructor, Department of Comparative Literature

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
I received a teaching and research fellowship to diversify the curriculum in the Master in American Studies program and to conduct research in American Studies.

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Supervised 1 MA student who was subsequently accepted into a PhD program in American and Canadian Studies at the University of Nottingham.
▪️ Designed and taught a humanities course that increased written and oral communication skills and intercultural knowledge and competence for ~20 adult learners.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Faculty

profile_positions.description:
📸 SNAPSHOT
I was recruited for this role to manage ~30 corporate accounts and supervise corporate English language trainers.

🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️ Managed accounts of 30+ corporate clients, performed training needs analysis, recruited trainers to meet client needs.
▪️ Designed and facilitated a train-the-trainer workshop on language learning approaches for adult learners for ~30 language trainers.
profile_positions.title: Training Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
🌟 HIGHLIGHTS
▪️Designed and taught courses in general English, business English, and English for special purposes for 10 corporate clients (incl. SAP, US Pharmacia, Janssen-Cilag, Toyota Bank, PwC).
profile_positions.title: English Language Trainer

volunteer_experiences.description:
NOMV seeks to transform the status of mental wellness within the profession so veterinary professionals can survive and thrive through education, resources, and support.

I designed 10 pages of Lifeboat training to train peer tutors to support 30,000 NOMV members.
I collaboratively designed and developed a mini-course on financial literacy using the EasyGenerator platform.

Freewheels Houston distributes bikes to people who need a way to work, school or other destinations including refugees, teenagers and veterans emerging from homelessness.

In my time with Freewheels I catalogued bikes donated to the organization, cleaned them, and did minor repairs.
